            <string language="en">This illustration demonstrated how a Hall probe works in measuring magnetic flux density.</string>

          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration a démontré comment une sonde

          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração demonstrada como uma ponta de

          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione dimostrata come una sonda

            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση κατέδειξε πώς ένας έλεγχος
